description: A colorful stir-fry with grilled chicken, bell peppers, broccoli, and carrots. Served with a savory soy sauce glaze.
Ground beef seasoned with taco spices, served in soft tortillas with lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
Juicy turkey meatballs in marinara sauce, served with spaghetti and a sprinkle of parmesan cheese.
A comforting chicken and vegetable pot pie with a flaky crust
Lightly seasoned white fish fillets, served in soft tortillas with a refreshing mango salsa.
Crispy baked chicken breasts topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese, served over spaghetti.
Shrimp saut√©ed with a mix of bell peppers, snap peas, and onions, served in a tangy stir-fry sauce.
